item.title: Julie Andrews - My Favorite Things - Baritone Ukulele - Key of Dm, EM
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE Ukulele.
Chords used: Dm, Bbmaj7, Gm, C7, F, Bb, A7, D, G, G7, Em, Cmaj7, Am, D7, C, B7, E, A, D6
As performed by Julie Andrews in “The Sound of Music”
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/4eFEPAiSnjA
Chord chart ("Tabs") available at: https://ukutabs.com/m/misc-movies/my-favorite-things-two/
************************************************
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. Motion video background from https://www.motionbolt.com
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. If you don't have a podcast app, please check out Radio Public for all your podcasts--they support podcasters financially.
You are invited to visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (a free resource). Also on social media: Twitter (@UkeStuff) and Instagram (@ukestuff.info).
Want to make a donation towards this work? Visit https://www.buymeacoffee.com/ukestuff
Are you a teacher using ukulele in the classroom? Check out my video based method...effective, easy, and inexpensive! https://ukestuff.wordpress.com/the-video-ukulele-method/
Check out the "merch": https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Grace VanderWaal - I Don't Like You - Baritone Ukulele - Key of Dm
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE Ukulele. Key of Dm.
Chords Used: Dm, Bb, C, Am, A

item.title: Toby Turner & Tobuscus - I Can Swing My Sword! - Key of Dm
item.description:
I Can Swing My Sword! (Minecraft Song) by Toby Turner. It’s been lowered by 2 semitones so beginner ukulele students can play along. For educational use. Chords Used: Dm F A
To see the Tobuscus animation video click here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eN7dYDYfvVg .
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: J Balvin - Mi Gente - Key of Dm
item.description:
Mi Gente by J Balvin, Willy William. It’s been lowered by 2 semitones so beginner ukulele students can play along. For educational use. Chord Used: Dm
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Survivor - 'Rocky" Eye Of The Tiger - Key of Dm
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Dm
Chords Used: Dm, C, A, Bb, F, Gm
As performed by Survivor.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/tbjfpz8at8A
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6
We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Gotye - Somebody That I Used To Know - Key of Dm
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Somebody That I Used To Know - Gotye (feat. Kimbra)
Using the chords: Bb C Dm
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU D DU or D XU D XU (X=chuck)
This video is meant for educational purposes and ukulele lessons.
No copyright infringement intended.

item.title: Marshmello - One Thing Right - Key of Dm
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Dm.
Chords Used: Dm, Bb, F, C
As performed by Marshmello & Kane Brown
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/fKBayPdhryM
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. The motion background is from motionbolt.com.

item.title: Time for a Tune Up (The Joy of Gone) Ukulele Play Along - Key of D, Dm
item.description:
